727437f-a.title: Queens: Mott Avenue - Eggert Place
727437f-a.text:
Mott Ave., at the N.W. corner of Egmert Place, showing Aunt
Sally Mott's homestead, owned by Mrs. Seaman from 1878 to 1891. It
is said that this house was built by Squire John Mott during the time
of the Revolutionary War. It is now known as Mrs. Seaman's Cottage..
January 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
